docblock.description: API class that allows static usage of the master INI controller
API class that allows static usage of the master INI controller
docblock.long-description: Provides a static interface for direct manipulation of INI files. All methods in this class directly read from and write to INI files.

tag.name: version
tag.description: 0.1.0-review.1 Peer review version 1. Currently in development; Not fully tested yet.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Contains the filepath used in the last call to readFile()

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array containing the output of parse_ini_file generated in the last call to readFile()

tag.name: var
tag.description: Contains the output of the last call to generateFile()

docblock.description: Adds/sets a specified key=value pair to an INI file.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If set to bool 'TRUE', will attempte to create $parFile if it doesn't already exist. Defaults to bool 'FALSE'

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Fetches the full INI file as a multi-level associative array

tag.name: return
tag.description: In the format of $array['Section']['Key'] = 'Value'

docblock.description: Fetches an INI section from a file as an associative array

tag.name: return
tag.description: In the format of $array['Key'] = 'Value'. Returns boolean 'FALSE' if no matching section was found

docblock.description: Fetches the value of a requested key=value pair from an INI file.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The value of the requested key=value pair, OR boolean 'FALSE' if no matching entry was found.

docblock.description: Deletes a key=value pair from an INI file.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Reads the specified file.
docblock.long-description: Reads the specified file, storing the file name in $this->file, output of parse_ini_file() in $this->fileArray, and then running $this->generateFile() afterwards.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full/relative path to the INI file to read. Defaults to $this->file

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $parFile and $this->file are both null

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $this->file does not exist or is unreadable

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If parse_ini_file() fails to parse $this->file

docblock.description: Writes data stored in $this->fileArray into $this->file

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full/relative path to the INI file to read. Defaults to $this->file

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $parFile and $this->file are both null

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $this->file is not writable

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If file_put_contents() fails to write to $this->file

docblock.description: Generates a fully formatted INI string and stores it in $this->fileContent

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Master class that all other INI controllers in this package will extend.
Master class that all other INI controllers in this package will extend.
docblock.long-description: This class handles all of the common, internal functions for the INI controller. You probably don't want to directly use this class unless you're writing your own controller that extends it; Instead use one of the other classes that extend this.

tag.name: internal
tag.description: This class is designed for use by child classes that extend it, it is not meant to be used directly.

tag.name: version
tag.description: 0.1.0-review.1 Peer review version 1. Currently in development; Not fully tested yet.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Contains the filepath used in the last call to readFile()

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array containing the output of parse_ini_file generated in the last call to readFile()

tag.name: var
tag.description: Contains the output of the last call to generateFile()

docblock.description: Reads the specified file.
docblock.long-description: Reads the specified file, storing the file name in $this->file, output of parse_ini_file() in $this->fileArray, and then running $this->generateFile() afterwards.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full/relative path to the INI file to read. Defaults to $this->file

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $parFile and $this->file are both null

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $this->file does not exist or is unreadable

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If parse_ini_file() fails to parse $this->file

docblock.description: Writes data stored in $this->fileArray into $this->file

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full/relative path to the INI file to read. Defaults to $this->file

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $parFile and $this->file are both null

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $this->file is not writable

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If file_put_contents() fails to write to $this->file

docblock.description: Generates a fully formatted INI string and stores it in $this->fileContent

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: API class that allows object/in memory usage of the master INI controller
API class that allows object/in memory usage of the master INI controller
docblock.long-description: Provides an object for loading INI files into memory. Methods in this class will read from and write to data stored in memory. INI files are only directly read or modified using the 'load' and 'save' methods.

tag.name: version
tag.description: 0.1.0-review.1 Peer review version 1. Currently in development; Not fully tested yet.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Contains the filepath used in the last call to readFile()

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array containing the output of parse_ini_file generated in the last call to readFile()

tag.name: var
tag.description: Contains the output of the last call to generateFile()

docblock.description: ObjectController constructor. Alias of self::load(). Does nothing if no file parameter is provided.
Loads the specified INI file into memory.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The INI file to load into memory. Defaults to the last INI file that was loaded into memory or written to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Saves the INI data currently in memory to the specified file.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The INI file to save data to. Defaults to the last INI file that was loaded into memory or written to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Adds/sets a key=value pair in memory

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Fetches the full INI file from memory as a multi-level associative array

tag.name: return
tag.description: In the format of $array['Section']['Key'] = 'Value'

docblock.description: Fetches an INI section from memory as an associative array

tag.name: return
tag.description: In the format of $array['Key'] = 'Value'. Returns boolean 'FALSE' if no matching section was found

docblock.description: Fetches a value from a key=value pair

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns the value of a key=value pair OR boolean 'FALSE' if no matching entry was found

docblock.description: Deletes a key=value pair from memory

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

docblock.description: Reads the specified file.
docblock.long-description: Reads the specified file, storing the file name in $this->file, output of parse_ini_file() in $this->fileArray, and then running $this->generateFile() afterwards.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full/relative path to the INI file to read. Defaults to $this->file

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $parFile and $this->file are both null

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $this->file does not exist or is unreadable

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If parse_ini_file() fails to parse $this->file

docblock.description: Writes data stored in $this->fileArray into $this->file

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full/relative path to the INI file to read. Defaults to $this->file

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $parFile and $this->file are both null

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If $this->file is not writable

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If file_put_contents() fails to write to $this->file

docblock.description: Generates a fully formatted INI string and stores it in $this->fileContent

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success
